decisions.description: If the "Request creation" flow is called by the "New Call Qualification" flow then the existing Request should be update and not a request creation

rules.name: Request_Creation_called_from_a_flow_in_the_Case_record
rules.label: "Request Creation" called from a flow in the Case record?

decisions.description: When qualifying a Task, the resolution will be Request to STore but for the case it will be Request Creation temporary because of ICX_New_Call_Qualification flow and validation rule of MyCR
decisions.name: What_request_type
decisions.label: What request type ?

formulas.name: careServiceOrigin
formulas.expression: IF({!sObject} = "Task", "CSC Call", IF({!sObject} = "LiveChatTranscript", "CSC Chat", IF({!sObject} = "MessagingSession","CSC Messaging", IF({!sObject} = "Case", "CSC Email", ""))))

formulas.description: Case Record type ID from Operation Exception
formulas.name: CaseOperationExceptionRT

formulas.description: Find the correct record type for the Request according to the origin of the case
formulas.name: FormulaRequestRT

formulas.description: ID of the User who launch the flow
formulas.name: FormulaRunningUser

formulas.description: New status except for POD with Sku -> "Follow-up"
formulas.name: FormulaStatus
FormulaSubject
formulas.expression: IF( NOT(ISNULL({!POD_with_Sku})), "Product on Demand - "+{!VarProductSkuName}, IF( NOT(ISNULL({!POD_without_Sku})), "Product on Demand without sku - "+{!VarUnknownProduct}, IF( NOT(ISNULL({!CaseCallRT})), "ObjTaskCall.Subject", {!ObjCase.Subject})))

formulas.name: PODwithoutSkuRT

formulas.description: For the Qualification record, the ParentRelatedTo__c field should be set to empty only from a New request (Case list view or Account detail page)
